title: Follow-up workflow: Mutual Action Plan templates not loading/applying correctly

sections.text: Fix the Mutual Action Plan (MAP) template flow so the correct template list loads reliably for the selected account/opportunity and applies the chosen template steps without dropping or duplicating items. Resolve cases where template selection fails after CRM sync or opportunity stage changes, causing MAPs to be created with empty/default steps. Add lightweight instrumentation around template fetch/apply and MAP creation to confirm the fix in production.
